title: Roblox to End Remote Work Policies; Metaverse and Digital Workspaces ‘Still Not There’
description: Roblox, a metaverse gaming company, has recently announced the end of its remote work policies, calling all but a few workers to work from its headquarters in San Mateo, California. Roblox founder and CEO David Baszucki stated that the metaverse and digital workspaces were still not as “engaging, collaborative, and productive as physical spaces.” Roblox […]

title: Anthropic Engages American Public Input to Forge Revolutionary Constitution for AI
description: In a groundbreaking initiative, Anthropic, the innovative AI startup behind the popular Claude chatbot, has undertaken a collaborative effort with the Collective Intelligence Project (CIP) to harness the collective wisdom of 1,000 American citizens in shaping a unique “Constitution for AI.” This bold venture seeks to unravel the intricate relationship between democratic processes and the ...
